title: But Rito, You Promised!
body:
What happened to the bugfix on Azir's Turrets? The fix was supposed to be included in patch 4.19. You guys said so yourselves!

"We're aware of a bug where Azir's Sun Disc currently does not ramp up in damage. We'll be fixing this in patch 4.19."
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-418-notes

Looks like Azir is gonna spend another 2 weeks with a quarter of his power budget not even functioning properly.......

I understand, you guys wanted to make Singed look pretty, and function better, and I am all for that. But not at the expense of a bugfix that was promised to take place. Lets not forget that this bug Makes Azir's passive complete and utter garbage at all stages of the game.

Rito pls

replies.body: OP raises valid concern but downvoting for not said "PWOMISED" in title.
Petition to rename Topic Titles for this very reason confirmed
